      • drawMapLayer

        private void drawMapLayer(java.lang.String layer,
                float xShift,
                float yShift,
                int startX,
                int startY)
        Draws a tiled map layer on the primary graphics element
        Parameters:
        layer - the layer name to draw
        xShift - the sub tile x shift to move the whole layer by
        yShift - the sub tile x shift to move the whole layer by
        startX - the x index of the tile to begin drawing at
        startY - the y index of the tile to begin drawing at
